welcome_page_text_description:
Thank you for choosing Nobara!
This welcome screen will help guide you through the
available resources for Nobara as well as help you setup 
your computer to your liking.

Enjoy!
The Nobara team
update-nobara-subtitle: Update all applications and system packages.
open-driver-manager-subtitle:
A driver utility to install various driver such as the
proprietary NVIDIA® drivers that significantly increase performance for NVIDIA cards 
and microcode for CPUs and such.
open-tweak-tool-subtitle: A tweak tool that allows configuring things such as automounting of disk drive partitions and enabling/disabling automatic updates within a gamescope session.
open-software-manager-title: Install and/or manage flatpak applications and permissions from Flatpost.
open-software-manager-subtitle: Install and/or manage flatpak applications and permissions from Flatpost.
install-snaps-title: Install the snap store to install and/or manage snap applications.
install-snaps-subtitle: Install the snap store to install and/or manage snap applications.
open-webapp-manager-subtitle:
Install WebApps with your favourite web browser as a backend. Turn your favourite WebApps into 
native desktop applications.
join-discord-subtitle: Join Nobara Official Discord, and chat with the developers and other users.
kdenlive-subtitle: KDE Non-Linear Video Editor an open source video editor built on Qt and the KDE Frameworks libraries.
blender-subtitle: Blender is the free and open source 3D creation suite. It supports the entirety of the 3D pipeline.
obs-subtitle: Open Broadcaster Software the free and open source software for video recording and live streaming.
gpu-screen-recorder-subtitle: A shadowplay-like screen recorder for Linux.
discord-subtitle:
Discord is a VoIP and instant messaging social platform. Users have the ability to communicate
with voice calls, video calls, text messaging, media and files in private chats or as part of
communities called servers.
open-nobara-issues-subtitle:
See if your issue has been reproduced before,
and has a solution in our website.
contribute-github-subtitle: Contribute code or open issues and pull request to Nobara Github.
contribute-design-title: Visit The Designs Channel in our Discord server
contribute-design-subtitle: Submit Designs and Wallpapers to our #memes Discord Channel.
contribute-patreon-subtitle: If you enjoy the work done on Nobara, Proton-GE, or any other related projects, please consider donating. Thank you!
contribute-kofi-subtitle: Provided as an alternative to Patreon.
open-nobara-resolve-wizard-subtitle: Install or update DaVinci Resolve and perform fixes to allow it to run.
open-protonplus-subtitle:
Compatibility tool for Steam Play based on Wine and additional components made by GloriousEggroll
this tool allows steam to run windows games natively on linux.
